data.author: ELEQUENT

changelog.release_notes:
Version 1.5
Change Logs:
1. Add bluetooth state indicator and color option;
2. Add charging state indicator

Version 1.4:
Change Logs:
1. Layout updates: Full screen, day font, and battery indicator;
2. Add inverted color for Pebble Original.

Version 1.3:
Change Log:
Add Pebble Original compatibility. Background: 50% dithering.

Version 1.1:
Change Logs:
Add Day, Battery and Date display, and option to hide them.

Ver1.0:
Pure Number: Inspired by numbers, the up two rows represent the hour, and the bottom two row for the minutes. I will add battery, date and more customization settings in my future updates. Hope you guys like it.

data.description: Pure Numbers: Inspired by numbers, the up two rows represent the hour, and the bottom two row for the minutes. I will add battery, date and more customization settings in my future updates. Hope you guys like it.
data.title: Pure Number
